title: Testing suggests faulty cable may be to blame for melting RTX 4090 connectors
description: More reports of overheating power connectors have surfaced every day this week.

title: Poliovirus that paralyzed unvaccinated NY man in July is still spreading
description: Sewage samples as recent as October 6 have tested positive for the same virus.

title: Comcast wants Internet users to pay more because customer growth has stalled
description: New sign-ups are scarce, so Comcast says revenue per user drives broadband growth.

title: How to download a backup copy of your Twitter data (or deactivate your account)
description: If you treasure your tweets, it's easy to get a backup copy for your own safekeeping.

title: VMware patches vulnerability with 9.8/10 severity rating in Cloud Foundation
description: NSX-V appliance, which VMware no longer supports, also affected and patched.

title: Report: Google will graciously let Android OEMs build Amazon Fire devices
description: Pressure from EU regulators makes Google accept Android forks, at least for TVs.

title: Doc who thinks vaccinated people are magnetic is in big trouble with med board
description: It's unclear if her defense will include putting keys and forks on people's faces.

title: Pebble, the OG smartwatch that may never die, updated to work with Pixel 7
description: Deep inside Google, a signed update makes the smartwatch 64-bit-Android ready.

title: Meta Quest Pro review: For those with more money than sense
description: Nearly four times the price definitely doesn’t mean nearly four times the quality.

title: Now in charge of Twitter, Musk is expected to reverse bans—including Trump’s
description: Musk previously called the Trump ban "morally wrong and flat-out stupid."

title: US embassies may have accidentally improved air quality
description: Cities where US embassies installed air monitors saw improved air quality.

title: A scientist’s quest for an accessible, unhackable voting machine
description: After 19 years of work, Juan Gilbert says he has invented the most secure voting machine.

title: Meet the Windows servers that have been fueling massive DDoSes for months
description: Misconfigured CLDAP services on MS domain controllers are amplifying data floods.

title: Rocket Report: Norway’s nuclear rocket concerns; Ariane 6 delayed again
description: "When the briefing ended, I was baffled and, if I’m honest, angry."

title: No new combustion engines cars from 2035, says European Union
description: New cars will have to meet a 50% reduction in CO2 by 2030 ahead of complete ban.

title: Elon Musk completes Twitter purchase, immediately fires CEO and other execs
description: Musk completes $44B purchase, fires CEO Parag Agrawal and others.
